original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro sattho rājagahā paṭiyālokaṁ gantukāmo hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññataraḥ satthaḥ rājagahā paṭiyālokam gantu kāmo hoti
aññataraḥ bhikkhu te manusse etat avoca
mayam kho bhante suṅkam pariharissāma ati

original: Atha kho te kammiyā taṁ satthaṁ gahetvā acchinditvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho te kammiyāḥ tam sattham gahetvā a chinditvā tam bhikkhum etat avocu

original: “kissa tvaṁ, bhante, jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ gacchasī”ti?
analyzed: kissa tva bhante jānam theyyasatthena saddhim gacchasi iti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṁ gantvā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu sāvatthim gantvā bhikkhūnam etam attham ārocesi

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjissatī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhu jānam theyyasatthena saddhim savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjissati iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, bhikkhu, jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjasī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva bhikkhu jānam theyyasatthena saddhim savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjasi iti

original: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjissasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa jānam theyyasatthena saddhim savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjissasi
neta moghapurisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ theyyasatthena saddhiṁ saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjeyya, antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam theyyasatthena saddhim savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjeyya antamasaḥ gāmantaram pi pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: sāmaṁ vā jānāti, aññe vā tassa ārocenti, so vā āroceti.
analyzed: sāmam vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti saḥ vā āroceti

original: corā katakammā vā honti akatakammā vā, rājānaṁ vā theyyaṁ gacchanti suṅkaṁ vā pariharanti.
analyzed: corā kata kammāḥ vā honti a kata kammāḥ vā rājānam vā theyyam gacchanti suṅkam vā pariharanti

original: “gacchāmāvuso, gacchāma, bhante; gacchāma, bhante, gacchāmāvuso, ajja vā hiyyo vā pare vā gacchāmā”ti saṁvidahati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: gacchāma āvuso gacchāma bhante gacchāma bhante gacchāma āvuso ajja vā hiyyas vā pare vā gacchāma ati sa vidahati āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kukkuṭa sampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Theyyasatthe theyyasatthasaññī saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: theyyasatthe theyyasattha saññī savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjati antamasaḥ gāmantaram pi āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Theyyasatthe vematiko saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: theyyasatthe vematikaḥ savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjati antamasaḥ gāmantaram pi āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Theyyasatthe atheyyasatthasaññī saṁvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṁ paṭipajjati, antamaso gāmantarampi, anāpatti.
analyzed: theyyasatthe atheyyasattha saññī savidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjati antamasaḥ gāmantaram pi anāpatti

original: Bhikkhu saṁvidahati, manussā na saṁvidahanti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: bhikkhu savidahati manussā na savidahanti āpatti dukkaṭassa
